Class PressureSensor

java.lang.Object
  ie.ucd.sensetile.sensorboard.simulator.formal.sensor.PressureSensor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISensor
public final class PressureSensor
extends Object
implements ISensor

This class represents a pressure sensor.

JML Specifications 
    invariant mod_min <= mod_value && mod_value <= mod_max; 
    constraint mod_max == 5585; 
    constraint mod_min == 310; 
    constraint a_type == PressureSensorType.APS; 
    constraint a_unit == MeasurementUnit.PASCAL;
